Sand Kingdom.requires: |Cascade Kingdom Power Moon:5| OR ( |Cascade Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Cascade Kingdom Power Moon:2| )

Lake Kingdom.requires: ( |Sand Kingdom Power Moon:16| OR ( |Sand Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Sand Kingdom Power Moon:13| ) OR ( |Sand Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Sand Kingdom Power Moon:10| ) ) AND ( |Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:16| OR ( |Wooded Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:13| ) OR ( |Wooded Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:10| ) )

Wooded Kingdom.requires: ( |Sand Kingdom Power Moon:16| OR ( |Sand Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Sand Kingdom Power Moon:13| ) OR ( |Sand Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Sand Kingdom Power Moon:10| ) ) AND ( |Lake Kingdom Power Moon:8| OR ( |Lake Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Lake Kingdom Power Moon:5| ) )

Lost Kingdom.requires: ( ( |Lake Kingdom Power Moon:8| OR ( |Lake Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Lake Kingdom Power Moon:5| ) ) AND ( |Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:16| OR ( |Wooded Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:13| ) OR ( |Wooded Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:10| ) ) ) and {OptOne(|Ground Pound|)}

Snow Kingdom.requires: ( ( |Metro Kingdom Power Moon:20| OR ( |Metro Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Metro Kingdom Power Moon:17| ) OR ( |Metro Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Metro Kingdom Power Moon:14| ) ) AND ( |Seaside Kingdom Power Moon:10| OR ( |Seaside Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Seaside Kingdom Power Moon:7| ) ) ) and {OptOne(|Sherm|)}

Seaside Kingdom.requires: ( ( |Metro Kingdom Power Moon:20| OR ( |Metro Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Metro Kingdom Power Moon:17| ) OR ( |Metro Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Metro Kingdom Power Moon:14| ) ) AND ( |Snow Kingdom Power Moon:10| OR ( |Snow Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Snow Kingdom Power Moon:7| ) ) ) and {OptOne(|Sherm|)}

Very Early Luncheon.requires: ( |Snow Kingdom Power Moon:10| OR ( |Snow Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Snow Kingdom Power Moon:7| ) ) AND ( |Seaside Kingdom Power Moon:10| OR ( |Seaside Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Seaside Kingdom Power Moon:7| ) )

Ruined Kingdom.requires: ( |Luncheon Kingdom Power Moon:18| OR ( |Luncheon Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Luncheon Kingdom Power Moon:15| ) OR ( |Luncheon Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Luncheon Kingdom Power Moon:12| ) )

Bowser's Kingdom.requires: |Ruined Kingdom Power Moon:3| OR |Ruined Kingdom Multi-Moon|

Moon Kingdom.requires: ( |Bowser's Kingdom Power Moon:8| OR ( |Bowser's Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Bowser's Kingdom Power Moon:5| ) ) and {OptOne(|Pokio|)}
